item.description:
I've been asked and the temps are right for a little disc golf ! Join me at 5 sharp to toss some discs at the baskets along this wooded course. You don't have to be good but give it a try and have some fun. It's also good exercise as we maneuver along the path ways. The store we are meeting at has free loaner discs. Please wear good shoes and long pants.Bring water to drink and bug spray as they may be out too. Last be not least is a fun attitude :)

Here's a link to the area.. http://www.dgcoursereview.com/reviews.php?id=1588&mode=rev

My number 603-315-0275

 

Please DO NOT rsvp NO if you can't come. I just want to see those who want to join me.

Thank you
item.how_to_find_us: we'll meet at the store across from the park to pick up discs
item.name: wimp disc golf
